page.title: 04TOURISM
page.content: The area attracts many visitors.On the south side of the{River Severn}many come to look at and walk in the countryside but the main interest is the River where{canoeing}can take place. On the north side of the River at Rodley there is a{camping site}where visitors stay whilst discovering and looking at old buildings in the area.Tourists enjoy the walk by the River looking at the beauty of the Water Gardens at Westbury on Severn,at the wealth of wild flowers,strolling on Rodley Sands or even{painting}the scenery. Visitors,however,mainly stay in Gloucester and plan day trips although some houses do provide bed and breakfast.
